articles.description: So far in May, SD Shibulal has purchased Infosys shares worth Rs 100 crore on May 12, Rs 100 crore on May 19, and Rs 100 crore on May 24 through open market deals. The shares were offloaded by Kumari Shibulal on all the occasions.
articles.content:
New Delhi:SD Shibulal, co-founder of Ltd., has purchased Rs 100 crore worth of company shares from wife Kumari Shibulal for the second time this week.
